verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> will we <S%G2046>say<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>forefather,<s%> has <S%G2147>found<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh?<s%>

<S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> was <S%G3049>it<s%> <S%G3049>counted?<s%> When he <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision?<s%> <S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> a <S%G4973>seal<s%> of the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> he had while he was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision,<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> those who <S%G4100>believe,<s%> though they might <S%G1223>be<s%> in <S%G203>uncircumcision,<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> might <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G3049>accounted<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> is the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> to those who <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4748>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> in the <S%G2487>steps<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> he had in <S%G203>uncircumcision.<s%>

<S%G3754><s%> <S%G2531>As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "I have <S%G5087>made<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> a <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations.<s%>" This is in the <S%G2713>presence<s%> of him <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G4100>believed:<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who gives <S%G2227>life<s%> to the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>calls<s%> the things that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> though they <S%G5607>were.<s%>
